name: TANDEM (Ben Littler, Stephen Wolczyk, KyleWood)
description:
This is our entry into Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2021, our team name is Screw Loose Studio, and our game's name is TANDEM.

In TANDEM, the player is tasked with undergoing an initiation ritual to join a mysterious cult, the player must complete puzzles and challenges in order to succeed in this initiation. 

In this task, the player is joined together with his spirit form, his soul's ethereal being tethered to his corporeal form through a beam of heavenly light, using his spirit form's unnatural power, the protagonist intends to sever the ties that link him to the light and plunge himself into the darkness of the cult he yearns for.

---

Screw Loose Studio:

Kyle Wood, Stephen Wolczyk & Ben Littler
